snippet: Wimbledon champion Andy Murray is not overly enthusiastic about the possibility of a neutral venue hosting the Davis Cup finals, but backed proposals to shorten matches in the competition....
lead_paragraph: Wimbledon champion Andy Murray is not overly enthusiastic about the possibility of a neutral venue hosting the Davis Cup finals, but backed proposals to shorten matches in the competition.

headline.print_headline: Neutral Venue for Davis Cup Finals Unappealing to Murray
headline.main: Neutral Venue for Davis Cup Finals Unappealing to Murray
